target_markets.market_description: Cricut users and crafters who need SVG design files for their tabletop CNC machines
pain_points: need constant supply of new design files
target_markets.market_size_indicators: Cricut is a billion-dollar company, Creative Fabrica doing $30M/year, millions of shops on Etsy selling these files

target_markets.market_description: Companies needing internal communication and knowledge management solutions
pain_points: lack of visibility into what different departments are doing
target_markets.market_size_indicators: Could easily sell for $5K+ per month per company

problems_validated.problem: Cricut users need constant supply of SVG design files but current solutions are expensive per-file purchases
problems_validated.severity: High - users are 'ravenous' for this content and actively spending money
problems_validated.current_solutions: Individual file purchases on Etsy, Creative Fabrica subscription service
problems_validated.market_gap: AI can now generate these files at scale, making unlimited subscriptions more profitable

products_tools.name: Creative Fabrica
products_tools.use_case: Unlimited subscription to SVG files for Cricut users

products_tools.name: Cricut
products_tools.pricing: high ticket item with recurring material sales

products_tools.name: Riverside/Zoom

business_strategies.strategy: Freemium model with free bundle leading to unlimited subscription
business_strategies.implementation: Offer free 20-file bundle via Facebook ads, then nurture into paid subscription
business_strategies.expected_results: Build email list for under $1 per subscriber, convert to recurring revenue
business_strategies.case_study: Got downloads for less than $1 each, could build 10K customer list for $5K spend

business_strategies.strategy: SEO-driven marketplace with hundreds of thousands of landing pages
business_strategies.implementation: Build landing pages for target keywords, rank organically, offer free bundle for signups
business_strategies.expected_results: Organic inbound traffic leading to subscription conversions
business_strategies.case_study: Validated demand exists through Etsy keyword research

problems_solutions.problem: Creating SVG files at scale for Cricut marketplace
problems_solutions.solution: Fully automated AI workflow using APIs
steps: Generate designs in Discord with bot
problems_solutions.time_estimate: can create bundles overnight with no human intervention

startup_ideas.idea: Unlimited SVG subscription service for Cricut users
startup_ideas.problem_solved: Expensive per-file purchases and limited design options
startup_ideas.business_model: Freemium with free bundle leading to monthly subscription
startup_ideas.validation: Facebook ads to Cricut interest targeting, less than $1 cost per download achieved
startup_ideas.investment_needed: $5K to build initial 10K customer email list

startup_ideas.idea: Internal company recap service called 'All Hands Recap'
startup_ideas.target_market: CEOs and management teams at growing companies
startup_ideas.problem_solved: Lack of visibility into what different departments are doing
startup_ideas.business_model: Monthly subscription service at $5K+ per month
startup_ideas.validation: Interview heads of growth, create AI-generated insights, distribute via Slack

mistakes_to_avoid.mistake: Not validating demand before building complex systems
mistakes_to_avoid.consequences: Wasting time and resources on unproven ideas
mistakes_to_avoid.prevention: Run small tests and betas before full implementation
mistakes_to_avoid.example: Speaker tested all ideas as betas or alpha versions before considering full builds
